mapper.select: SELECT p_c.category_code, p_c.category_name, sum(o_d.product_count) as pieCount FROM product p join u_o_detail o_d on p.p_no = o_d.p_no JOIN p_category p_c on p_c.category_code = p.category_code group by p_c.category_code, p_c.category_name

SELECT age||'대' as age, count(case when customer_sex='M' Then 1 End) as menCount, count(case when customer_sex='W' Then 1 End) as womenCount FROM(SELECT floor((to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')+1 - (substr(customer_rrn,0,2)+ (case when substr(customer_rrn,7,1)<3 then 1900 when substr(customer_rrn,7,1)>=3 then 2000 end)))/10)*10 as age, c.customer_sex FROM customer c join u_order u ON c.customer_no = u.customer_no join u_o_detail d ON u.order_no = d.order_no ) group by age order by age

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM')||'월' AS orderMonth, NVL(sum(a.sum), 0) graphSumPrice FROM ( SELECT to_char(o.order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') order_date, sum(u.product_price*u.product_count) sum FROM u_o_detail u join u_order o on u.order_no = o.order_no WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY order_date ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE('2022-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE('2022-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2022-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM-DD') AS orderDay, NVL(sum(a.sum), 0) daySum FROM ( SELECT to_char(o.order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') order_date, sum(u.product_price*u.product_count) sum FROM u_o_detail u join u_order o on u.order_no = o.order_no WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by order_date ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE('2022-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE('2022-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2022-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM-DD') HAVING substr(to_char(b.dt,'MM-DD'),0,2) = #{dbMonth} ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM-DD')
